TEXT.Italian: Titolo
TEXT.Spanish: Title

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Title (see requirements)
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Title (see requirements)
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Title (see requirements)

TEXT.Italian: %s1_PlyrName ha completato %s2_PrjctName!
TEXT.Spanish: %s1_PlyrName ha completado %s2_PrjctName

TEXT.French: %s1_PlyrName a achevé : %s2_PrjctName !
TEXT.Italian: %s1_PlyrName ha completato %s2_PrjctName!
TEXT.Spanish: %s1_PlyrName ha completado %s2_PrjctName.

TEXT.English: %s1_PlyrName has lost the title of the %s2_PrjctName!

TEXT.Italian: %s1_PlyrName has lost the title of the %s2_PrjctName!
TEXT.Spanish: %s1_PlyrName has lost the title of the %s2_PrjctName

TEXT.Italian: [ICON_STAR]Holds the title of the %s1_Desc
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_STAR]Holds the title of the %s1_Desc

TEXT.French: [ICON_STAR]You hold the title of the %s1_Desc
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_STAR]You hold the title of the %s1_Desc
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_STAR]You hold the title of the %s1_Desc

TEXT.French: Empereur romain
TEXT.Italian: Imperatore romano
TEXT.Spanish: Emperador romano

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cannot collapse as long as Constantinople is under control
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cannot collapse as long as Constantinople is under control
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Kann nicht Zerfallen solange Konstantinopel unter Kontrolle ist
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cannot collapse as long as Constantinople is under control
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cannot collapse as long as Constantinople is under control

TEXT.English: Requirements:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Control Constantinople and 3 other cities in Thrace and Anatolia[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If the title is not vacant, vassalize the holder[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The title is lost if the holder's civilization is destroyed.
TEXT.French: Requirements:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Control Constantinople and 3 other cities in Thrace and Anatolia[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If the title is not vacant, vassalize the holder[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The title is lost if the holder's civilization is destroyed.
TEXT.German: Voraussetzungen:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Kontrolliert Konstantinopel und 3 andere Städte in Thrakien und Anatolien[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Wenn der Titel nicht besetzt ist, unterwerft den Besitzer[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Der Titel geht verloren wenn der Besitzer zerstört wird.
TEXT.Italian: Requirements:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Control Constantinople and 3 other cities in Thrace and Anatolia[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If the title is not vacant, vassalize the holder[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The title is lost if the holder's civilization is destroyed.
TEXT.Spanish: Requirements:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Control Constantinople and 3 other cities in Thrace and Anatolia[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If the title is not vacant, vassalize the holder[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The title is lost if the holder's civilization is destroyed.

TEXT.French: Commandeur des croyants
TEXT.Italian: Comandante dei Credenti
TEXT.Spanish: Principe de los creyentes

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can call for a [LINK=Holy Wars]holy war[\LINK] against infidels and heretics[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+2 Attitude vs. Leaders with same State [ICON_RELIGION][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+25% Base Piety[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+50% Piety Loss for Actions Against State [ICON_RELIGION]
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can call for a [LINK=Holy Wars]holy war[\LINK] against infidels and heretics[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+2 Attitude vs. Leaders with same State [ICON_RELIGION][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+25% Base Piety[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+50% Piety Loss for Actions Against State [ICON_RELIGION]
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Kann einen [LINK=Holy Wars]Heiligen Krieg[\LINK] gegen Ungläubige und Ketzer ausrufen[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+2 Haltungspunkte zu Staatsoberhäupten mit derselben[ICON_RELIGION][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+25% Glaube[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+50% mehr Glaubensverlust bei Aktionen gegen Staats-[ICON_RELIGION]
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can call for a [LINK=Holy Wars]holy war[\LINK] against infidels and heretics[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+2 Attitude vs. Leaders with same State [ICON_RELIGION][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+25% Base Piety[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+50% Piety Loss for Actions Against State [ICON_RELIGION]
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can call for a [LINK=Holy Wars]holy war[\LINK] against infidels and heretics[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+2 Attitude vs. Leaders with same State [ICON_RELIGION][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+25% Base Piety[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+50% Piety Loss for Actions Against State [ICON_RELIGION]

TEXT.English: Requirements:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Control Baghdad[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Have [ICON_SUNNI] or [ICON_SHIA] as State Religion[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If the title is not vacant, vassalize the holder[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The title is lost if the holder's civilization is destroyed, or if the holder abandons Islam.
TEXT.French: Requirements:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Control Bagdad[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Have [ICON_SUNNI] or [ICON_SHIA] as State Religion[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If the title is not vacant, vassalize the holder[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The title is lost if the holder's civilization is destroyed, or if the holder abandons Islam.
TEXT.German: Voraussetzungen:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Kontrolliert Baghdad[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Habt [ICON_SUNNI] oder [ICON_SHIA] als [ICON_RELIGION][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Wenn der Titel nicht besetzt ist, unterwerft den Besitzer[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Der Titel geht verloren wenn der Besitzer zerstört wird oder den Islam aufgibt.
TEXT.Italian: Requirements:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Control Baghdad[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Have [ICON_SUNNI] or [ICON_SHIA] as State Religion[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If the title is not vacant, vassalize the holder[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The title is lost if the holder's civilization is destroyed, or if the holder abandons Islam.
TEXT.Spanish: Requirements:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Control Baghdad[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Have [ICON_SUNNI] or [ICON_SHIA] as State Religion[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If the title is not vacant, vassalize the holder[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The title is lost if the holder's civilization is destroyed, or if the holder abandons Islam.

TEXT.English: %D1: "You are the Commander of the Faithful."
TEXT.French: %D1: "You are the Commander of the Faithful."
TEXT.Italian: %D1: "You are the Commander of the Faithful."
TEXT.Spanish: %D1: "You are the Commander of the Faithful."

TEXT.French: Shahanshah
TEXT.Italian: Shahanshah
TEXT.Spanish: Shahanshah

TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+10 Stability[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_CULTURE] in All Cities
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+10 Stability[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_CULTURE] in All Cities
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+10 Stability[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_CULTURE] in All Cities

TEXT.English: Requirements:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Control Jibal, Tabaristan, Fars, Kerman, Luristan, Kurdistan, Yazd and Western Khorasan[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If the title is not vacant, vassalize the holder[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The title is lost if the holder's civilization is destroyed.
TEXT.French: Requirements:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Control Jibal, Tabaristan, Fars, Kerman, Luristan, Kurdistan, Yazd and Western Khorasan[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If the title is not vacant, vassalize the holder[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The title is lost if the holder's civilization is destroyed.
TEXT.German: Voraussetzungen:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Kontrolliert Dschibal, Tabaristan, Fars, Kerman, Luristan, Kurdistan, Yazd und West-Khorasan[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Wenn der Titel nicht besetzt ist, unterwerft den Besitzer[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Der Titel geht verloren wenn der Besitzer zerstört wird.
TEXT.Italian: Requirements:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Control Jibal, Tabaristan, Fars, Kerman, Luristan, Kurdistan, Yazd and Western Khorasan[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If the title is not vacant, vassalize the holder[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The title is lost if the holder's civilization is destroyed.
TEXT.Spanish: Requirements:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Control Jibal, Tabaristan, Fars, Kerman, Luristan, Kurdistan, Yazd and Western Khorasan[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If the title is not vacant, vassalize the holder[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The title is lost if the holder's civilization is destroyed.

TEXT.French: Le chérif de la Mecque
TEXT.Italian: Sharif of Mecca
TEXT.Spanish: Jerife de La Meca

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 Attitude vs. Leaders with [ICON_SUNNI] or [ICON_SHIA] State Religion
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 Attitude vs. Leaders with [ICON_SUNNI] or [ICON_SHIA] State Religion
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 Attitude vs. Leaders with [ICON_SUNNI] or [ICON_SHIA] State Religion
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 Attitude vs. Leaders with [ICON_SUNNI] or [ICON_SHIA] State Religion

TEXT.English: Requirements:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Control Hejaz[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Have [ICON_SUNNI] or [ICON_SHIA] as State Religion[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If the title is not vacant, vassalize the holder[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The title is lost if Mecca is lost, if the holder's civilization is destroyed, or if the holder abandons Islam.
TEXT.French: Requirements:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Control Hejaz[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Have [ICON_SUNNI] or [ICON_SHIA] as State Religion[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If the title is not vacant, vassalize the holder[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The title is lost if Mecca is lost, if the holder's civilization is destroyed, or if the holder abandons Islam.
TEXT.German: Voraussetzungen:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Kontrolliert Hejaz[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Habt [ICON_SUNNI] oder [ICON_SHIA] als [ICON_RELIGION][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Wenn der Titel nicht besetzt ist, unterwerft den Besitzer[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Der Titel geht verloren wenn Mekka verloren geht, der Besitzer zerstört wird oder den Islam aufgibt.
TEXT.Italian: Requirements:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Control Hejaz[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Have [ICON_SUNNI] or [ICON_SHIA] as State Religion[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If the title is not vacant, vassalize the holder[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The title is lost if Mecca is lost, if the holder's civilization is destroyed, or if the holder abandons Islam.
TEXT.Spanish: Requirements:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Control Hejaz[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Have [ICON_SUNNI] or [ICON_SHIA] as State Religion[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If the title is not vacant, vassalize the holder[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The title is lost if Mecca is lost, if the holder's civilization is destroyed, or if the holder abandons Islam.

TEXT.English: %D1: "You protect the Holy City of Mecca."
TEXT.French: %D1: "You protect the Holy City of Mecca."
TEXT.Italian: %D1: "You protect the Holy City of Mecca."
TEXT.Spanish: %D1: "You protect the Holy City of Mecca."

TEXT.French: Protector of the Holy Sepulchre
TEXT.Italian: Protector of the Holy Sepulchre
TEXT.Spanish: Protector of the Holy Sepulchre

TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+20% Base Piety
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+20% Base Piety
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+20% Base Piety

TEXT.English: Requirements:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Control Jerusalem[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Have [ICON_CATHOLICISM] or [ICON_ORTHODOXY] as State Religion[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If the title is not vacant, vassalize the holder[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The title is lost if Jerusalem is lost, if the holder's civilization is destroyed, or if the holder abandons Christianity.
TEXT.French: Requirements:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Control Jerusalem[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Have [ICON_CATHOLICISM] or [ICON_ORTHODOXY] as State Religion[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If the title is not vacant, vassalize the holder[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The title is lost if Jerusalem is lost, if the holder's civilization is destroyed, or if the holder abandons Christianity.
TEXT.German: Voraussetzungen:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Kontrolliert Jerusalem[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Habt [ICON_CATHOLICISM] oder [ICON_ORTHODOXY] als [ICON_RELIGION][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Wenn der Titel nicht besetzt ist, unterwerft den Besitzer[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Der Titel geht verloren wenn Jerusalem verloren geht, der Besitzer zerstört wird oder das Christentum aufgibt.
TEXT.Italian: Requirements:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Control Jerusalem[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Have [ICON_CATHOLICISM] or [ICON_ORTHODOXY] as State Religion[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If the title is not vacant, vassalize the holder[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The title is lost if Jerusalem is lost, if the holder's civilization is destroyed, or if the holder abandons Christianity.
TEXT.Spanish: Requirements:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Control Jerusalem[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Have [ICON_CATHOLICISM] or [ICON_ORTHODOXY] as State Religion[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If the title is not vacant, vassalize the holder[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The title is lost if Jerusalem is lost, if the holder's civilization is destroyed, or if the holder abandons Christianity.

TEXT.French: Vikramaditya
TEXT.Italian: Vikramaditya
TEXT.Spanish: Vikramaditya

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All foreign provinces in Hindustan become border provinces[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+2 Attitude vs. Leaders with [ICON_HINDUISM] State Religion
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All foreign provinces in Hindustan become border provinces[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+2 Attitude vs. Leaders with [ICON_HINDUISM] State Religion
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Alle Grenzprovinzen in Hindustan werden zu historischen Provinzen[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+2 Haltungspunkte zu Staatsoberhäupten mit [ICON_HINDUISM]
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All foreign provinces in Hindustan become border provinces[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+2 Attitude vs. Leaders with [ICON_HINDUISM] State Religion

TEXT.English: %D1: "Your valour is equal to the Sun."
TEXT.French: %D1: "Your valour is equal to the Sun."
TEXT.Italian: %D1: "Your valour is equal to the Sun."
TEXT.Spanish: %D1: "Your valour is equal to the Sun."

TEXT.English: Requirements:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Control at least 6 provinces in Hindustan[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Have [ICON_HINDUISM] as State Religion[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If the title is not vacant, vassalize the holder[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The title is lost if the holder's civilization is destroyed, or if the holder abandons Hinduism.
TEXT.French: Requirements:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Control at least 6 provinces in Hindustan[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Have [ICON_HINDUISM] as State Religion[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If the title is not vacant, vassalize the holder[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The title is lost if the holder's civilization is destroyed, or if the holder abandons Hinduism.
TEXT.German: Voraussetzungen:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Kontrolliert mindestens 6 Provinzen in Hindustan[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Habt [ICON_HINDUISM] als [ICON_RELIGION][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Wenn der Titel nicht besetzt ist, unterwerft den Besitzer[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Der Titel geht verloren wenn der Besitzer zerstört wird oder den Hinduismus aufgibt.
TEXT.Italian: Requirements:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Control at least 6 provinces in Hindustan[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Have [ICON_HINDUISM] as State Religion[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If the title is not vacant, vassalize the holder[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The title is lost if the holder's civilization is destroyed, or if the holder abandons Hinduism.
TEXT.Spanish: Requirements:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Control at least 6 provinces in Hindustan[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Have [ICON_HINDUISM] as State Religion[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If the title is not vacant, vassalize the holder[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The title is lost if the holder's civilization is destroyed, or if the holder abandons Hinduism.
